section_1.title: PIRAAT
section_1.subtitle: Any pirate will definitely fall in love with it!
section_1.text: 清爽的甜味水果將您的味蕾傳遞到熱帶目的地，無論外面的天氣如何

section_2.title: Belgian Strong Ale
section_2.subtitle: Beer Style
section_2.text: With aggressive amounts of hops and malts a mild sweetness is coupled with colorful aromas fresh bread, spices, tropial fruits for a compex taste any ‘Pirate’ would enjoy!

section_3.title: PAIRINGS
section_3.text: At the table it suits hearty and strong flavoured dishes such as game and foie gras.

list.text1: foie gras, ripened and refined cheeses

section_1.title: TAIWAN BEER CLASSIC
section_1.subtitle: As a Taiwanese, I have to say it’s CLASSIC!

section_2.title: Pale Lager-North Am. / Light
section_2.subtitle: beertype
section_2.text: Barley malt, Penglai rice and aromatic, bitter-flavored hops, retaining a strong scent of wheat and refreshing hops, fresh and refreshing.

section_3.title: PAIRINGS
section_3.text: The classic taste, paired with Taiwanese classic snacks, is definitely the best.
